reuters.title: RPT - ARGENTINE GRAIN/OILSEED EXPORT PRICES ADJUSTED
reuters.body: The Argentine Grain Board adjusted minimum export prices of grain and oilseed products in dlrs per tonne FOB, previous in brackets, as follows: Sorghum 64 (63), sunflowerseed cake and expellers 103 (102) , pellets 101 (100), meal 99 (98), linseed oil 274 (264), groundnutseed oil 450 (445), soybean oil 300 (290), rapeseed oil 290 (280). Sunflowerseed oil for shipment through May 323 (313) and june onwards 330 (320). The board also adjusted export prices at which export taxes are levied in dlrs per tonne FOB, previous in brackets, as follows: Bran pollard wheat 40 (42), pellets 42 (44). REUTER 
